Uses of Package
io.atomix.copycat

  • Packages that use io.atomix.copycat 
    Package Description
    io.atomix.copycat
    Core Copycat APIs, including CopycatClient and CopycatReplica.
    io.atomix.copycat.atomic
    Provides distributed atomic variables such as DistributedAtomicValue.
    io.atomix.copycat.collections
    Provides distributed collections such as DistributedMap and DistributedSet.
    io.atomix.copycat.coordination
    Provides distributed coordination resources such as DistributedLock and DistributedLeaderElection and DistributedTopic for publish-subscribe messaging.
  • Classes in io.atomix.copycat used by io.atomix.copycat 
    Class and Description
    Copycat
    Base type for creating and managing distributed resources in a Copycat cluster.
    Copycat.Builder
    Copycat builder.
    CopycatClient
    Client-side Copycat implementation.
    CopycatClient.Builder
    Client builder.
    CopycatException
    Copycat exception.
    CopycatReplica
    Server-side Copycat implementation.
    CopycatReplica.Builder
    Copycat builder.
    PersistenceMode
    Data persistence mode.
    Resource
    Copycat resource.
  • Classes in io.atomix.copycat used by io.atomix.copycat.atomic 
    Class and Description
    PersistenceMode
    Data persistence mode.
    Resource
    Copycat resource.
  • Classes in io.atomix.copycat used by io.atomix.copycat.collections 
    Class and Description
    PersistenceMode
    Data persistence mode.
    Resource
    Copycat resource.
  • Classes in io.atomix.copycat used by io.atomix.copycat.coordination 
    Class and Description
    Resource
    Copycat resource.
